name: Project Warped Public Pre-Alpha
description:
Project: Warped is a solo game development project running since Fall of 2017. It is a Survival Horror game designed from the ground-up for VR with a focus on item interaction and inventory management.

The current build supports HTC Vive, Valve Index and Oculus Rift with Oculus Touch controllers, although you have to start it in SteamVR.

Current demo features are limited to the basic mechanics of the game, such as navigation, item interaction and inventory management.

If you have one of the VR headsets mentioned above, I will highly appreciate if you take the time to try out the prototype and let me know if it works with your setup, as well as anything else that comes to mind regarding your user experience.

When you start, pick up the letter in front of you using the trigger on your controller to get started.

DISCLAIMER: This game page is for test builds only and will NOT be converted to a full release page. Donations will NOT give access to any future game releases, so only donate if you wish to support the developer.
